short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check if an email is phishing with one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply highlight any text and click the extension icon, and you will be presented with a phishing analysis.

Features include:
- Phishy keyword detector 
- Spell check
- Unsafe links
- Overall rating

Enjoy :)
